stimulusHtml: Which of the following strategies is most likely to help identify the logic error?

features.html: A student wrote a program to calculate the average of several numeric scores. The program compiles without error but produces incorrect results when it runs. The student suspects there is a logic error in the code.

choicesHtml: Changing random parts of the code and rerunning the program until the error is resolved
Inserting print statements throughout the code to check the calculations at various points in the execution
Relying on the compiler’s error messages to detect the logic error
Running the program multiple times without making changes to see if the error corrects itself
